The pattern of the sequence of numbers follows each number is raised to the power of 3.

19^3 = 9
9^3 = 81
81/3 = 27
27^3 = 3
3^3 = 27/3
4^3 = 64
64^3 = 4
3^3 = 27/3
3^3 = 3
3^3 = 27/3
